message: Did you come to serve me? On your knees!

replies.text: What would I gain from that?
You are very rude and poorly educated. Maybe I should introduce myself? $playername is my name.
I will serve you - my weapon. Attack!

message: The path to Blackwater mountain has been cut off. There are also increasing attacks by monsters. These things have driven down trade, making supplies hard to get.

replies.text: So all the food you sell is old?
Where is Blackwater mountain?
Why are monster attacks increasing?
Thanks for the information. I have to leave now.

message: Welcome to our wonderful Inn. How can we help you?

replies.text: Who are you?

message: That dreadful place has been left abandoned ever since. Recently, however, undead have started pouring out of the prison, and we had to send guards to keep them away from the road.

replies.text: N
Can I help you with Flagstone?
Is there anything I could help you with?
There was something else I wanted to ask you about.
Well, it was a tough fight, but I managed to slay Lord Erwyn himself.
The undead are no match for me.

message:
(low voice) Well-behaved. 
(loud voice) And now: Mead for everyone! Let's be merry! Forget all sorrows!
Yes, indeed. My daughter has not come home for some days. I don't know what's happened to her.

replies.text: And you have no idea where she might be?

message: They started attacking the town recently. Nobody is sure why. Their attacks have been unsuccessful, so we are all hoping that they will give up soon and go back to wherever they came from.

replies.text: Thanks for the information, but I have to leave.
Thanks for the information. Do you have anything to trade?
Thanks. I'm looking for my brother, Andor. Has anyone new been through here recently?
How do I get to Blackwater mountain?

message: Just follow the path west, but you will have to find a way past the rockfall.

replies.text: Thanks for the directions. I'm headed there right now.
Thanks. What about the monsters?
Thanks for the information. Please show me what you have to trade.

message: He told me that it is very far from here, to the northeast, beyond the river and the mountains.

replies.text: N

message: But it would be reckless of me to ask such a young kid as you to go so far to the northeast.

replies.text: I've had enough - bye.
Don't worry about me. I can handle myself.
I'm an adventurer. I'm afraid of nothing.
Remgard. *sigh*. OK, I'll do it.
